name: mini pumpkins
notes:
learn to make a mini pumpkin with this free and easy amigurumi crochet pattern!

for this pattern you will need:

-worsted weight yarn (size 4)

-polyester fiber fill

-3.75mm crochet hook

-yarn needle                  

-scissors

-stitch markers

-pins

abbreviations:

mr- magic ring

st- stitch

sc- single crochet

inc- increase (sc twice in one stitch)

dec- decrease (sc two stitches together)

blo- sc in back loops only
